WorkItem.Description:
I have received a Deubg Info file at 04/06/2013 09:15:33 with error message:
Publishing operation failed because the console and remote server versions do not match.

To avoid this, I have added some check in WPP to disable publishing attempte when Server and console version mismastch.
WorkItem.Summary: Publishing operation failed because the console and remote server versions do not match.
